Articles.Content:
Write a story pertaining to an aforementioned idea.

Example:

a prompt...

Aliens come to earth to store their unwanted cheesemakers

and then someone else writes the story...

It started two weeks ago. They came in their huge spacecraft and made first contact. They made a deal with humanity; They give us technology and safety in exchange for letting them put their cheesemakers here.

and then that person makes a prompt and another person writes a story following said prompt and then makes his own prompt and so on and so forth.

Rules:

Don't make it too long.

Have fun.

I'll start it off.

A legendary baker has a secret mission.

He needed to make the Mega-Chocolate-Cake out of the rarest of cocoa beans, but rival bakers and the Brazilian government were in his way. He fought his way and got the cocoa beans and made the Mega-Chocolate-Cake.

An astronaut rides in the cargo bay of a spacecraft.

The cargo bay opens, and the astronaut flies out to do an EVA. The radiator was broken and he had to replace it.

A rover charges toward the closed VAB doors.

The AI in the rover wants to be a Battering RAM.

A pyramid is found on the moon.

ILLUMINATI - said someone

Frogs took control of planet Earth

It fires a laser at earth, but it reflects off a mirror somewhere and destroys the pyramid. The Illuminati become very angry and they try to find Earth, and end up at Kerbin instead. Then this(http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/137473-The-Segway-Incident) happens.

A mysterious 10-meter tall chocolate bar has appeared on the top of the VAB.

Edited November 13, 2015 by Monkey29399
Forgot the prompt

Frogs become the dominant species, but they don't progress very far with no tool-making capablilities. Jeb does a triple booster flip and lands smack on top of the chocolate bar and eats it from the top down.

A human appears on Kerbin.

It's about dang time the enterprise got to Kerbin. Captain Kirk proceeds to make "first contact" with the native females of this species.

Rick rolling is a capital offense. Edited November 19, 2015 by Legendary Emu
woops
